annotations:
DEAR ALL / ULAS

 

GOOD DAY

 

PLSE KINDLY PPOSE FOR BELOW LADY

 

+ OPEN PENANG,  MALAYSIA  O/A    26-31 AUGUST  2024

 

+ GRAIN CLEAN

 

+ CO2 FITTED , A60 FITTED

 

 

MV 

 CHARBEL  1 (EX HAPPINESS FRONTIER)
SDBC,  BUILT IN JAPAN 2011

Flag: Marshall Islands / Class: NKK

28,218 MT DWT / 9.819 m SSW / TPC: 39.7

LOA/BEAM/DEPTH 169.37/27.20/13.60M

grt 17,019 / NET 10,108

grain / bale: 37,320.63 / 35,742.83

Ho/Ha: 5/5

Hatch Size: NO.1 13.60 × 16.00 / NO.2 - NO.5 19.20 × 17.60

Gears: 4 x 30 .50 mt swl basis hook

 

SPEED/CONSUMPTION AT SEA

Main engine -EPL MAX ABT 71.00%:

(B) abt 13.00knots on abt 18.00 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.1 mts/day lsmgo

(L) abt 12.50knots on abt 18.00 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.1 mts/day lsmgo

 

EcoS (ALWAYS WOG) -EPL MIN ABT 50%:

(B) abt 12.00kt on abt 15.00 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.1 mts/day lsmgo

(L) abt 11.50kt on abt 15.00 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.1 mts/day lsmgo

 

Daily port consumption:

(I)    abt 3.0 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.2 mts/day lsmgo.

(W) abt 4.0 mts/day vlsfo/lsmgo + abt 0.2 mts/day lsmgo.

ADA

 

 

fulL tc desc attached

 

PLSED TO HEAR RATED BIZ

 

plse ALWAYS CC  dry@tmcshipping.com when pposing

 

kind regds

ULAS
